content:

thought: In order to craft purple wool, I need to craft purple dye first. Purple dye requires red dye and blue dye. Red dye can be obtained from rose bushes, so I will move the rose bush from slot 10 to slot 1.
Ok
act: move from slot 10 to slot 1 with quantity 1

Ok

thought: To craft purple wool, I need to craft purple dye. Purple dye requires crafting 1 blue dye and 1 red dye. I have 2 red dyes in my inventory and 1 cornflower which I can craft into blue dye. Therefore I will start by moving the cornflower into the crafting grid.
Ok
act: move from slot 16 to slot 1 with quantity 1

Ok
act: move from slot 13 to slot 1 with quantity 1
